net.nemerosa.ontrack.model.security

Interface EncryptionService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EncryptionServiceImpl

    public interface EncryptionService
    Service to decrypt and encrypt secrets.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String crypted)
      Decrypts a secret into a plain form from its encrypted version.
      java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String plain)
      Encrypts a secret, given in its plain form, and returns a string suitable for secure storage.
      java.lang.String exportKey()
      Gets the encryption key.
      void importKey(java.lang.String key)
      Imports the encryption key.

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String plain)
        Encrypts a secret, given in its plain form, and returns a string suitable for secure storage.
        Parameters:
        plain - Secret to encode
        Returns:
        Encrypted secret

      • decrypt

        java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String crypted)
        Decrypts a secret into a plain form from its encrypted version.
        Parameters:
        crypted - Encrypted secret
        Returns:
        Plain secret

      • exportKey

        java.lang.String exportKey()
        Gets the encryption key.
        Returns:
        Key encoded as Base64
        Throws:
        EncryptionException - If the key cannot be exported

      • importKey

        void importKey(java.lang.String key)
        Imports the encryption key.
        Parameters:
        key - Key encoded as Base64
        Throws:
        EncryptionException - If the key cannot be imported
